plot: Armed only with laser lip-gloss and a pair of blend-in pants, 11 year old Beanie must save his parents from Evil Stella and return the Golden Nit to its rightful place at the heart of the sun, thereby saving the universe.
title: The Itch of the Golden Nit
plot_es: Armed only with laser lip-gloss and a pair of blend-in pants, 11 year old Beanie must save his parents from Evil Stella and return the Golden Nit to its rightful place at the heart of the sun, thereby saving the universe.
original_name: The Itch of the Golden Nit
plot_en: Armed only with laser lip-gloss and a pair of blend-in pants, 11 year old Beanie must save his parents from Evil Stella and return the Golden Nit to its rightful place at the heart of the sun, thereby saving the universe.
